title: Social Engagement Recommendations
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest local events based on my interests and availability, so that I can stay socially connected despite my limited mobility.

title: Scheduled Video Calls for Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to schedule regular video calls with my family and friends so that I can maintain social connections despite my limited mobility.

title: Interest-Based Community Interaction – Facilitating Local Meetups and Clubs
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to suggest local meetups and clubs based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and continue volunteering despite my limited mobility.

title: Memory Lane Features – Storytelling Prompts for Social Connection
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to have access to storytelling prompts that help me share memories and experiences with family and friends so that I can foster deeper connections and maintain my social ties despite my limited mobility.

title: Flexible Communication Modes – Voice-to-Text Messaging for Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to use voice-to-text messaging to easily communicate with my family and friends so that I can stay socially connected despite my reduced mobility and busy schedule.

title: Enhanced Social Engagement
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide me with conversation starters so that I can engage meaningfully with my friends and family, helping to maintain my social connections despite my limited mobility.

title: Proactive Social Check-Ins
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to proactively check in with me and suggest social activities based on my interests and schedule so that I can stay socially connected and engaged despite my limited mobility.
